name: yukon
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a territory (= a large area of a country that has some local government but less independence than a province or a state) of northwestern Canada, whose capital city is Whitehorse: Alaska, Yukon, and Northwest Territories all back the big gas development plans. The 60th parallel separates the prairie provinces from the Yukon and the Northwest Territories.
More examplesFewer examplesThey found several hundred fragments of a meteor that crashed in southern Yukon at Tagish Lake on Jan. 18, 2000.areas of protected wilderness along the Rockies, from Yellowstone National Park in northern Wyoming to the Yukon, in northern CanadaDuring much of this era, a cold, dry grassland stretched across the Northern Hemisphere from eastern Europe into Alaska and the Yukon.
